title: Reverse Array
code:
§begin reverse
  original ← [10, 20, 30, 40, 50]
  reversed ← §create_array
  reversed ← [50, 40, 30, 20, 10]
  §iterate item §in reversed
    §transmit item
  §end_iterate
§end
solution_description: reverses the order of elements in an array
hints: The reversed array has elements in opposite order
Last element becomes first, first becomes last
